channel.title: Error when equipping
channel.description:
hey, i have been working on an allstar source, and i came across an error ingame... when i try to equip some items, i get a message saying "nothing interesting is happening" and in my runserver.bat i get this :
[client-1-reaperx]: Prayer Usage - ItemID: 1037
please help me :(

item.title: Error when equipping
